programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille sauve les pirates / Drôles d'oiseaux) S6 (11/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille sauve les pirates / Drôles d'oiseaux»Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Bird Watching Turbots.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime) S1 (14/15)
programme.desc: «L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime»Steel's automated delivery drones create chaos in the city and forest. Kai has to disable the drones real quick! // When Sir Steel's Slime Machine starts shooting slime everywhere, Bobbi has to pilot the Deer Squad Rescue Carrier to save the city.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Party People) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Party People»Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and the Bad Swap) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and the Bad Swap»Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair»It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et monsieur Curry) S1 (6/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et monsieur Curry»Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Tous à la piscine) S2 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Tous à la piscine»Peppa and George learn to swim, just like Kelly and Karel Konijn. And that swimming is fun through all your life, Papa Pig shows.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Jour de brume) S2 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Jour de brume»Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mama Pig and Papa Pig.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (La course à l'oasis) S5 (n°24)
programme.desc: «La course à l'oasis»Ice Cream Sellers Molly and Gil are trying to deliver ice cream to a waterpark on the other side of a hot desert. Will they get the ice cream across the desert unmelted before the Rattlers--a rattlesnake biker gang--catch them?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue et les couleurs) S1 (17/20)
programme.desc: «Blue et les couleurs»Josh and Blue are painting a portrait of their friends, but it's not quite finished. We play Blue's Clues to figure out who else Blue wants to add to her painting. While looking for clues we skidoo to help out our color friends!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Magic Spyglass) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «The Magic Spyglass»Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (A Shark Day's Night) S1 (22/28)
programme.desc: «A Shark Day's Night»The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une soirée pyjama avec Blue) S1 (18/20)
programme.desc: «Une soirée pyjama avec Blue»It's a special nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do for her first pajama party. While we play Blue's Clues we learn about why it gets dark and light outside and which animals prefer the nighttime.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Kiko's Song / Return to Merlandia) S2 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Kiko's Song / Return to Merlandia»When the coquís of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence.// The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Welcome Wagon) S1 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Welcome Wagon»When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Popcorn) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Popcorn»Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille et les écureuils / A la recherche du bébé kangourou) S6 (20/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille et les écureuils / A la recherche du bébé kangourou»The PAW Patrol is on a roll when squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse causing it to fall onto Daring Danny's skateboard! // It's a switcheroo situation when a joey is separated from its mama. It's up to the pups to save a roo and the day!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le patinage) S2 (8/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le patinage»There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le lavage de la voiture) S1 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le lavage de la voiture»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le déjeuner) S1 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le déjeuner»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping) S1 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Greedy Gobbler) S1 (n°67)
programme.desc: «The Greedy Gobbler»While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Longchair for Ron) S1 (n°68)
programme.desc: «A Longchair for Ron»A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue est triste) S1 (6/17)
programme.desc: «Blue est triste»Blue's feeling sad, so we play Blue's Clues to figure out why. Along the way to figuring out Blue's Clues, we help our Felt Friends and Blues' friends from her school deal with emotions and feelings in different situations.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le sauvetage des parachutistes / Les cupcakes d'Alex) S7 (11/26)
programme.desc: «Le sauvetage des parachutistes / Les cupcakes d'Alex»Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a day filled with Skydiving fun, but their adventure is quickly derailed. It's Paw Patrol to the rescue! // Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder, the Paw Patrol dives in to save the day!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art) S9 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art»When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs»Sir Steel unwittingly took over Bobbi's role to communicate with baby animals, with the help of his animal translator. // In his quest to win the Platinum City Flower Show, Sir Steel created super seeds that grow into gigantic mazes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist»Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! / Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Bataille de boules de neige / Le cadeau) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Bataille de boules de neige / Le cadeau»Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Banana) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Banana»Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Atchoum !) S1 (74/78)
programme.desc: «Atchoum !»Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Giant Strawberry) S1 (n°75)
programme.desc: «The Giant Strawberry»When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La bestiole baveuse) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La bestiole baveuse»A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grenouilles, vers et papillons) S1 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Grenouilles, vers et papillons»Peppa and George find frogs, worms and butterflies in Grandma Pig and Grandpa Pig's garden and they play with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les déguisements) S1 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Les déguisements»Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mama Pig and Papa Pig.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (We Love Nature) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «We Love Nature»Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! A thunder makes things worse. Luckily, Anna's living room makes a great camp site!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Key) S1 (n°69)
programme.desc: «The Key»Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fruits Surprise) S1 (n°70)
programme.desc: «Fruits Surprise»When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La princesse fatiguée) S1 (36/52)
programme.desc: «La princesse fatiguée»Papa Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a sleepy princess. In the story Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mama Pig is the queen and Papa Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La cabane dans l'arbre) S1 (37/52)
programme.desc: «La cabane dans l'arbre»Peppa and George visit Grandma Pig and Grandpa Pig. Grandpa Pig built them a tree house.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le grand prix des profondeurs) S5 (7/20)
programme.desc: «Le grand prix des profondeurs»For the first time ever, Blaze and AJ are racing under the ocean! Blaze transforms into a submarine and speeds through sunken ships and coral reefs to reach the giant sand castle at the finish line!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La Lessive) S3 (10/52)
programme.desc: «La Lessive»Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too - which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Blaze à l'épreuve du feu) S2 (11/20)
programme.desc: «Blaze à l'épreuve du feu»"While racing at the Monster Dome, Blaze spots smoke coming from a hot dog stand just past the finish line, so he transforms into a Fire Engine to put out the fire.".

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Attention, boules puantes ! / Les bébés autruches) S6 (6/26)
programme.desc: «Attention, boules puantes ! / Les bébés autruches»There is a strange smell by the swamp that chases all the animals away. Ostriches Oscar and Olivia are expecting chicks, but just before the eggs hatch, an eagle causes trouble.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille sauve les pirates / Drôles d'oiseaux) S6 (11/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille sauve les pirates / Drôles d'oiseaux»Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Bird Watching Turbots.

How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île aux pirates) S2 (23/52)
programme.desc: «L'île aux pirates»Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and her friends on a boat trip to pirate island to dig for treasure. Ahhhh ... while they are building a sand castle Grandpa fell asleep on the boat and drifted away ... What now?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vente de charité) S2 (19/52)
programme.desc: «La vente de charité»Peppa and George want to go to the playground with Papa and Mama Pig. But a fog sets in and they get lost. When Papa Pig thinks they are back home, the fog clears and they are... in the playground!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Tous à la piscine) S2 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Tous à la piscine»Peppa and George learn to swim, just like Kelly and Karel Konijn. And that swimming is fun through all your life, Papa Pig shows.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Jour de brume) S2 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Jour de brume»Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mama Pig and Papa Pig.

programme.desc: «Welcome Wagon»When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.desc: «Popcorn»Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone!

It's up to the pups to save a roo and the day!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le patinage) S2 (8/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le patinage»There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'aire de jeu) S1 (44/52)
programme.desc: «L'aire de jeu»Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa accroche une photo) S1 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Papa accroche une photo»Papa Pig promises to put up a picture of Peppa and George when Mama Pig is gone. He accidentally damages the wall, so Peppa and George help Papa Pig fix the wall before Mama Pig gets home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (A la plage) S1 (46/52)
programme.desc: «A la plage»Peppa and her family go to the beach. There they do all kinds of things, such as digging Papa Pig in the sand. When it's time to go home, they almost leave without Papa Big, because he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's New Blue Jeans) S1 (n°71)
programme.desc: «Bubu's New Blue Jeans»Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Everywhere at Once) S1 (n°72)
programme.desc: «Everywhere at Once»Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco) S2 (n°17)
programme.desc: «La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco»Who has put a new fountain in Crystal Lake which is against Park Rules? And it's upsetting Fish Hook! // Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les nouvelles lunettes de Magenta) S1 (9/17)
programme.desc: «Les nouvelles lunettes de Magenta»It's an exciting day for Magenta because she's getting glasses! We play a special game of Blue and Magenta's Clues to find out what Magenta wants to do when she gets her glasses and we get to go with her to meet.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon) S8 (13/24)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon»Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés»Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur»Whilst some of the Deer Squad down with flu, Sir Steel tries to become a superhero with disastrous results. // Sir Steel "borrows" water from Crystal Lake for his Water Park in the city, but things soon go wrong!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure»Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon»Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade, but instead of cutting lemons, they cut corners and learn if something's worth doing, it's worth doing right.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Popcorn) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Popcorn»Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Quiet Game) S1 (n°76)
programme.desc: «The Quiet Game»After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (We Love Nature) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «We Love Nature»Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! A thunder makes things worse. Luckily, Anna's living room makes a great camp site!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Friendship Journal) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Friendship Journal»Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal.".

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William vs. Wild) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «William vs. Wild»After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle) S9 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle»When Humdinger disguises himself as a "Merdinger" to steal the purple pearl, the PAW Patrol must return it to Puplantis. // After Moby swipes the Whale Patroller and all the Pups' vehicles, the pups climb aboard sea creatures to chase it down.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race) S9 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race»The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (L'équipe des Mécaniciens) S5 (12/20)
programme.desc: «L'équipe des Mécaniciens»Blaze stops into Gabby's Garage for a quick repair - just as she gets an alert! Three far-flung trucks need her mechanical know-how! So, Blaze and AJ volunteer to help her take her garage on the go!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le circuit du ciel) S2 (19/20)
programme.desc: «Le circuit du ciel»"As Blaze, AJ, and Gabby fly through the air with their friend Swoops, they see that a baby bird is about to be pulled into a storm! Swoops saves the baby bird from danger, but during his mission he loses his helicopter rotor, which flies off into the sky. Now Blaze and AJ must find the missing rotor, adventuring up onto the Sky Track, an amazing course that weaves through the clouds.".
